title: 'Surrender or die,' militia leader tells Ukrainian fighters in Severodonetsk; Pope says war perhaps 'provoked'
content:
1. 'Surrender or die,' militia leader tells Ukrainian fighters in Severodonetsk; Pope says war perhaps 'provoked'  CNBC
  2. Zelenskiy: 'Severe' fighting in 'literally every metre' of Sievierodonetsk  Guardian News
  3. Ukraine Fears Defeat in East Without Surge in Military Aid  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Zelenskky calls Russian invaders 'absolute evil' on the 110th day of war; Mass grave excavated near Bucha  CNBC

localize.title: セベロドネツクで民兵指導者がウクライナ人兵士に「降伏するか死ぬか」と発言、ローマ法王は戦争は「挑発された」可能性があると指摘
民兵领袖对塞维罗多涅茨克的乌克兰战士说："投降或死亡"；教皇说战争也许是 "挑起的"。
民兵領袖對塞維羅多涅茨克的烏克蘭戰士說："投降或死亡"；教皇說戰爭也許是 "挑起的"。
